# Coding Style Docs

> Documentation for Coding Style Docs.

*Topics available: 2*

- [.NET Coding Conventions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/coding-style/coding-conventions.md): Learn about commonly used coding conventions in C#. Coding conventions create a consistent look to the code and facilitate copying, changing, and maintaining the code. This article also includes the docs repo coding guidelines
- [Identifier names](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/coding-style/identifier-names.md): Learn the rules for valid identifier names in the C# programming language. In addition, learn the common naming conventions used by the .NET runtime team and the .NET docs team.
